page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: THERE IS A GREAT DEAL OF FARMING IN OUR AREA; IN FACT NEARLY ALL OUR AREA IS MADE UP OF FARMS.WE HAVE MOST SORTS OF FARMING INCLUDING DAIRY FARMING, SHEEP FARMING, BEEF FARMING AND ARABLE FARMING.THE BIGGEST FARM IS A MIXED FARM OWNED BY THE NEARBY LORD WANDSWORTH COLLEGE.OUTSIDE OF OUR SCHOOL WE HAVE A GREAT BIG FIELD AND IT IS FULL OF BLACK AND WHITE FREISAN COWS, THEY ARE DAIRY COWS. ACROSS THE OTHER SIDE OF THE ROAD IS A HUGE FIELD WHERE BARLEY IS BEING GROWN AND UNTIL RECENTLY, THE AREA TO THE WEST OF OUR BLOCK WAS GIVEN OVER ALMOST COMPLETELY TO THE REARING OF LAMBS. THIS YEAR THERE WERE SEVERAL LARGE FIELDS WHERE YELLOW OILSEED RAPE WAS GROWN.
